content:
Hello, my name is Kwan Sing. I have a deep passion in programming and love to create something people will use and be delighted by. 

Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at Aleph Labs, as a Front-End Developer. Main focus here are using ReactJS with GraphQL for frontend development and Jest for unit testing. 

I'm always looking for new opportunities to work on interesting projects. If you have a project you'd like to discuss, feel free to get in touch.
